cf.AncillaryVariables.remove_axes¶

AncillaryVariables.remove_axes(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Remove and return axes from each field.

fl.remove_axes() is equivalent to cf.List(f.remove_axes() for f in fl).

See cf.Field.remove_axes for details.

Parameters:
args, kwargs : optional

See cf.Field.remove_axes.
Returns:

out : cf.List

cf.AncillaryVariables.remove

Next topic
